title: By MLB Team Affiliates_MIAN-666
custom_preconds:
Currently, push notifications are set up as an all or nothing subscription to breaking news. This means everyone with the First Pitch app gets the same push notifications regardless of which team or affiliates you want to follow.
We want to set up the ability for users to subscribe to push notifications by MLB team affiliates.

title: Notifications Screen
custom_preconds: Given the user opens the app on initial launch and goes through the on boarding flow
custom_steps: When a user is on the favorite team page and either selects a team or chooses to bypass selecting a favorite team
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to the Notifications screen

title: Favorite Team Selected
custom_preconds: Given a user goes through the on boarding flow
custom_steps:
When a user had previously selected a favorite team, 
and is on the Notifications screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will view the notifications toggled on by default for the following:
- Notifications
- Sound
- MiLB News
- Favorite Teams (Home Game Reminder, Game Start, Game End, Scoring Plays, Lead Change)

And the rest of the teams will be listed in alphabetic order with the notifications toggled off by default.

title: No Favorite Team Selected
custom_preconds: Given a user goes through the on boarding flow
custom_steps:
When a user had not previously selected a favorite team, 
and is on the Notifications screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will view the notifications toggled on by default for the following:
- Notifications
- Sound
- MiLB News

And all the teams will be listed in alphabetic order with the notifications toggled off by default.

title: Favorite Team Notifications
custom_preconds: Give the user goes through the on boarding flow, had previously selected a favorite team, is on the Notifications screen
custom_steps: When a user views the notifications for the favorite team
custom_expected:
Then all team notification channels for that team will be enabled by default:
1. Home Game Reminder – Notification six hours before a team’s home game begins.
2. Game Start - Notification when a game begins.
3. Lead Change - Notification when a lead change occurs.
4. Score Change - Notification when a scoring play occurs.
5. Game End - Notification when a game concludes.

title: Toggle On Notifications, No Favorite Team Selected
custom_preconds: Given the user goes through the on boarding flow
custom_steps: When user taps on Done to bypass choosing a favorite team
custom_expected: Then the user is able to turn individual team Push Notifications on

title: Toggle On Notifications, Favorite Team Selected
custom_preconds: Given the user goes through the on boarding flow
custom_steps: When user selects a favorite team(s)
custom_expected: Then the user is able to turn individual team Push Notifications on

title: All Notifications Enabled & Saved
custom_preconds: Given a user has enabled All Notification channels in the on boarding flow
custom_steps: When the user goes to Settings->Notifications
custom_expected:
Then all of the settings made in the on-boarding flow will have been retained
and all the notification types are received

title: Enabled Team Notifications
custom_preconds: Give a user goes through the on boarding flow and views the Notifications screen
custom_steps: When a user views the notifications for a team that was selected as a favorite team
custom_expected: Then all the notification channels for that team will be enabled

title: Individual Notifications Enabled & Saved
custom_preconds: Given a user has enabled Individual Notification channels in the on boarding flow
custom_steps: When the user goes to Settings->Notifications
custom_expected:
Then all of the settings made in the on-boarding flow will have been retained
and only those individual notification types are received

title: Enabled Individual Notifications_Team Page Settings
custom_preconds: Given a user has enabled individual notification channels in the on boarding flow
custom_steps: When the user goes to a Team Page's, Settings
custom_expected:
Then all of the settings made in the on-boarding flow will have been retained
and those individual notification types are received

title: Enabled Notifications Saved, Exits the App
custom_preconds: Given a user has enabled notification in the on boarding flow
custom_steps:
When the user completes the on-boarding process
And the user exits the app
And the user returns to the app
custom_expected:
Then the notifications settings made in the on-boarding flow will have been retained
and those notification types are received

title: Toggle Off Notifications, No Favorite Team Selected
custom_preconds: Given the user goes through the on boarding flow
custom_steps: When user taps on Next to bypass choosing a favorite team
custom_expected: Then the user is able to turn Push Notifications off

title: Toggle Off Notifications, Favorite Team Selected
custom_preconds: Given the user goes through the on boarding flow
custom_steps: When user selects a favorite team(s)
custom_expected: Then the user is able to turn Push Notifications off

title: All Notifications Disabled & Saved_MIAN-605
custom_preconds: Given a user has disabled All Notification channels in the on boarding flow
custom_steps: When the user goes to Settings->Notifications
custom_expected:
Then all of the settings made in the on-boarding flow will have been retained
and no notification types are received

title: Disabled Team Notifications
custom_preconds: Give a user goes through the on boarding flow and views the Notifications screen
custom_steps: When a user views the notifications for a team that was not selected as a favorite team
custom_expected: Then all the notification channels for that team will be disabled

title: Individual Notifications Disabled & Saved
custom_preconds: Given a user has disabled Individual Notification channels in the on boarding flow
custom_steps: When the user goes to Settings->Notifications
custom_expected:
Then all of the settings made in the on-boarding flow will have been retained
and those individual notification types are not received

title: Disabled Individual Notifications_Team Page Settings
custom_preconds: Given a user has disabled individual notification channels in the on boarding flow
custom_steps: When the user goes to a Team Page's, Settings
custom_expected:
Then all of the settings made in the on-boarding flow will have been retained
and those individual notification types are not received

title: Disabled Notifications Saved, Exit the App
custom_preconds: Given a user has disabled notification in the on boarding flow
custom_steps:
When the user completes the on-boarding process
And the user exits the app
And the user returns to the app
custom_expected:
Then the notifications settings made in the on-boarding flow will have been retained
and those notification types are not received

title: Enable Individual Notifications via Settings
custom_preconds: Given a user goes into the Settings and taps on Notifications
custom_steps: When a user enables individual notifications
custom_expected: Then the notifications shall be saved and the user will receive the new notifications enabled in Settings

title: Edit Notifications via Settings, Enabled
custom_preconds:
Given a user has completed the push notifications process during on boarding
And navigates to Settings, Notifications
custom_steps: When user enables individual push notifications in Settings
custom_expected: Then the notifications shall be saved and the user will receive the new notifications saved in Settings

title: Edit Notifications, Enabled_Team Page Settings
custom_preconds: Given a user enables/disables individual push notifications during on boarding
custom_steps: When a user enables the individual notifications from a Team Page's, Settings
custom_expected: Then the notifications shall be saved and the user will receive the new notifications saved in Team Page's, Settings

title: Enable All Notifications via Settings
custom_preconds: Given a user goes into the Settings and taps on Notifications
custom_steps: When a user enables all notifications
custom_expected: Then the user shall receive all notifications

title: Enable Notifications via Settings, Exit or Kills app
custom_preconds: Given a user goes into the Settings and taps on Notifications
custom_steps:
When a user enables notifications
And exits or kills the app
And returns to the app
custom_expected:
Then the notifications state set shall be saved
And the user shall receive those notifications

title: Disable Individual Notifications via Settings
custom_preconds: Given a user goes into the Settings and taps on Notifications
custom_steps: When a user disables individual notifications
custom_expected: Then we should not receive those individual notifications

title: Edit Notifications via Settings, Disabled
custom_preconds:
Given a user has completed the push notifications process during on boarding
And navigates to Settings, Notifications
custom_steps: When user disables individual push notifications in Settings
custom_expected: Then the notifications shall be saved and the user will not receive the notifications saved in Settings

title: Edit Notifications, Disabled_Team Page Settings
custom_preconds: Given a user enables/disables individual push notifications during on boarding
custom_steps: When a user disables the individual notifications from a Team Page's, Settings
custom_expected: Then the notifications shall be saved and the user will not receive the notifications saved in Team Page's, Settings

title: Disable All Notifications via Settings
custom_preconds: Given a user goes into the Settings and taps on Notifications
custom_steps: When a user disables all notifications
custom_expected: Then the user shall receive no notifications

title: Disable Notifications via Settings, Exit or Kills app
custom_preconds: Given a user goes into the Settings and taps on Notifications
custom_steps:
When a user disables notifications
And exits or kills the app
And returns to the app
custom_expected:
Then the notification state set shall be saved
And the user shall not receive notifications

title: Notifications
custom_preconds: Given a game is in progress (in QA string a game to see the notifications)
custom_steps:
When the user has enabled the team push notification of:
- Home Game Reminder
- Game Start
- Lead Change
- Score Change
- Game End
custom_expected:
Then the user will receive the appropriate notification for each setting that was enabled and will be able to open each notification

Repeat for each notification separately

title: Verify Correct Team Notifications
custom_preconds: Given a user enables notifications on the mobile device
custom_steps:
When user enables notifications for the team they wish to use
and receives the various notification types
custom_expected:
Then user will end up being properly gated
and will not be receiving Gameday alerts from team the user is not subscribed for

title: Notification State
custom_steps: When a user is on the Notification screen and disables or enables notifications
custom_expected: Then all notifications will enter the state of the item chosen

title: Notification Display
custom_steps: When a notification is on the device and text appears clipped
custom_expected: Then the user is able to expand on the notification with two fingers in order to see the entire notification text

title: Dismiss Notification
custom_steps: When a user receives a notification and swipes the notification upward or waits five seconds
custom_expected: Then the notification will be dismissed

title: Notification Channels
custom_preconds: Given a user uses QA Homebase to create News Notifications
custom_steps:
When a user subscribes to different Push Notifications in Settings and then kills the app

Test with MiLB News Notification channel as well as individual channels for various teams
custom_expected: Then they should remain subscribed to those Push Notification channels and receive the corresponding notifications.

title: News
custom_preconds: Given a user uses QA Homebase to create News Notifications
custom_steps: When a user enables notifications for News on a device and then navigates to the push notification
custom_expected: Then we will receive the notification successfully and tapping on the notification will open up the First Pitch app and take the user to that article

title: Notification for another class (live game)
custom_preconds: Given a user has set up notifications for a team in one class (i.e. Triple A) and is on the scoreboard of another class (i.e. Double A) and a live game is in progress for the team the notifications were set up for
custom_steps: When the user is on the scoreboard for one class (i.e. Double A) and receives notifications for a team in another class (i.e. Triple A) and the user taps on that notification
custom_expected: Then the user should be taken to that corresponding notification's Gameday

title: Notifications for another class (game in final)
custom_preconds: Given a user has set up notifications for a team in one class (i.e. Triple A) and is on the scoreboard a team of another class (i.e. Double A) and a game is in final state for the team the notifications were set up for
custom_steps: When the user is on the scoreboard for one class (i.e. Double A) and receives notifications for a team in another class (i.e. Triple A) and the user taps on that notification
custom_expected: Then the user should be taken to that notification's Gameday Wrap

title: Purchase Tickets Push Notification Subscription
custom_preconds: Get Assistance from CMS to help set up this type of push notification in QA.  If testing in PROD set up Home Game Reminder notification 6 hours before game time starts.
custom_steps: When the users has the option for every teams channel to receive notifications
custom_expected: Then the users should be able to subscribe to the Purchase Tickets option on a per-team-basis.

title: Purchase Tickets Push Notification Prior to Game Start
custom_preconds: Get Assistance from CMS to help set up this type of push notification in QA.  If testing in PROD set up Home Game Reminder notification 6 hours before game time starts.
custom_steps: When it is six hours or less before a game starts and the user receives a push notification to purchase tickets
custom_expected:
Then the copy should read as:
The [Home team nickname] host [Road Team City Name] at [time (local)] [today/tonight (depending on time of game)]. Come out to [home ballpark name].

title: Purchase Tickets Push Notification
custom_preconds: Get Assistance from CMS to help set up this type of push notification in QA.  If testing in PROD set up Home Game Reminder notification 6 hours before game time starts.
custom_steps:
When the user receives a push notification to purchase tickets
AND the user taps on it
custom_expected: Then tapping on this notification will take the user to a "Purchase Tickets" page for that particular game.

title: Tapping on Notification When in App
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user receives a notification
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is in app and taps on the notifications (test all):
- home game reminder
- game start
- lead change
- score change
- game end
- news
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be taken to the appropriate place 
- home game reminder (user is taken to tickets page for that team)
- game start (corresponding gameday)
- lead change (corresponding gameday)
- score change (corresponding gameday)
- game end (corresponding gameday)
- news (user is taken to news article)
AND app should not crash

title: Tapping on Notification When Out of App
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user receives a notification
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is out of app (app has been backgrounded, closed, or screen is locked) and taps on the notifications (test all):
- home game reminder
- game start
- lead change
- score change
- game end
- news
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be taken to the appropriate place 
- home game reminder (user is taken to tickets page for that team)
- game start (corresponding gameday)
- lead change (corresponding gameday)
- score change (corresponding gameday)
- game end (corresponding gameday)
- news (user is taken to news article)
AND app should not crash

title: Player Notifications_MIAN-642
custom_preconds:
As a user, I want to be able to track my favorite players' performances. I want to be able to get notifications for players that take me to Gameday. Here are the following scenarios for which I want to be able to sign up for notifications:

Pitcher enters game or is in starting lineup
Pitcher strikes out 10th batter in a game
Pitcher wins a game
Pitcher saves a game
Pitcher completes a game
Player hits home run
Player collects three hits in a game
Player collects three RBIs in a game
Player steals a base
Player completes a cycle

There is still product work on verbiage and also on how and where this would surface and be managed. This is a wishlist item.

title: News
custom_preconds:
A device with an Android QA build with Push Notifications enabled is needed.

Push Notification prompt upon initial install or through Settings > Push Notification

Please e-Mail Mobile QA if you don't have this page for a copy of HTML document 'push notifications test util.html'

Settings for alert_push_test.html:
campaignCode=milb
campaignName=MiLB Push
apiKey: 3833a1f0-f702-11e3-93c5-a820661b986c
Keyword for News alert: milb.news:editorial
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to the test util.html and enters the following scenario:

Publication Test
Then adjusts the vendor_id to a new unique id that has not been used before
And we paste the following payload into the 'apnsPayload' section:

{"e":["editorial"],"aps":{"alert":{"body":"text text text.","action-loc-key":"View"},"sound":"default"},"c":["m.milb.news"]}

i.e.
{"e":["editorial"],"aps":{"alert":{"body":"Curtis Granderson is moving crosstown to the Mets on a four-year, $60M deal, a source told MLB.com. The Mets have not confirmed the deal.","action-loc-key":"View"},"sound":"default"},"c":["m.milb.news"]}

note: for the url, enter a mobile URL (i.e. m.milb.com) not the web url

And we hit Submit
custom_expected: Then we will receive the notification successfully and tapping on the notification will open up the First Pitch app and take the user to that article

title: Game Start
custom_preconds:
A device with an Android QA build with Push Notifications enabled is needed.

Push Notification prompt upon initial install or through Settings > Push Notification

Please e-Mail Mobile QA if you don't have this page for a copy of HTML document 'push notifications test util.html'

Settings for alert_push_test.html:
campaignCode=milb
campaignName=MiLB Push
apiKey: 3833a1f0-f702-11e3-93c5-a820661b986c
Keyword for gameday game.start: milb.team_idxxx:game.start

Use gameday file for teams & date & team id:
i.e. http://gd.qa.mlb.com/components/game/aaa/year_2017/month_03/day_29/gid_2017_03_29_omaaaa_nozaaa_1/
custom_steps:
When a user enables notifications for a team on a device and then navigates to push notification test util.html: 

Gameday test
and then changes vendor id to a new unique id that has not been used before
and we paste the following payload into the 'apnsPayload' section:

{"e":["game.start"],"aps":{"sound":"default","alert":{"body":"MiLB <teamname> alert","action-loc-key":"View"}},"c":["team_idxxx"], "gid" : "yyyy/mm/dd_teamcode_teamcode_1"}

i.e. 
{"e":["game.start"],"aps":{"sound":"default","alert":{"body":"MiLB Omaha Storm Chasers Start Alert","action-loc-key":"View"}},"c":["team_id541"], "gid" : "2017/03/29_omaaaa_nozaaa_1"}

And we hit Submit
custom_expected: Then we will successfully receive a notification of type 'game.start' and the notification will successfully open First Pitch and take us to Gameday

title: Score Change

custom_steps:
When a user enables notifications for a team on a device and then navigates to push notification test util.html: 

Gameday test and then changes vendor id to a new unique id that has not been used before
and we paste the following payload into the 'apnsPayload' section:

{"e":["game.pushscorechange"],"aps":{"sound":"default","alert":{"body":"MiLB <teamname> alert","action-loc-key":"View"}},"c":["team_idxxx"], "gid" : "yyyy/mm/dd_teamcode_teamcode_1_1"}

i.e. 

{"e":["game.pushscorechange"],"aps":{"sound":"default","alert":{"body":"MiLB Omaha score change","action-loc-key":"View"}},"c":["team_id541"], "gid" : "2017/03/29_omaaaa_nozaaa_1"}


And we hit Submit
custom_expected: Then we will successfully receive a notification of type 'game.pushscorechange' and the notification will successfully open First Pitch and take us to Gameday.

title: MiLB Display Name for Teams
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is subscribed to received notifications for a MiLB team
custom_steps:
WHEN a user receives a Gameday Notification

Game Start
Game End
Scoring Play
Lead Change
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the shortName of the club.

https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/teams/<teamId>
EX: https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/teams/137

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user goes into the Settings and taps on Notifications and disable individual notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then we should not receive those individual notifications

custom_steps_separated.content:
When we enable notifications on the mobile device
and we enable notifications for the team we wish to use
and we receive the various notification types
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then we will end up being properly gated
and we will not be receiving gameday alerts from team whom we are not subscribed for

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on the Notification screen and disables or enables notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then all notifications will enter the state of the item chosen

custom_steps_separated.content: When a notification is on the device and text appears clipped
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is able to expand on the notification with two fingers in order to see the entire notification text

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user receives a notification and swipes the notification upward or waits five seconds
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the notification will be dismissed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user subscribes to different Push Notifications in Settings and then kills the app

Test with MiLB News Notification channel as well as individual channels for various teams (use QA Homebase to create News Notifications)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then they should remain subscribed to those Push Notification channels and receive the corresponding notifications.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user enables notifications for News on a device and then navigates to the push notification (use QA Homebase to create a News notification)

OR

test util.html
Publication Test
Then adjusts the vendor_id to a new unique id that has not been used before
And we paste the following payload into the 'apnsPayload' section
{"e":["editorial"],"aps":{"alert":{"body":"Curtis Granderson is moving crosstown to the Mets on a four-year, $60M deal, a source told MLB.com. The Mets have not confirmed the deal.","action-loc-key":"View"},"sound":"default"},"c":["milb.news"]}

*note: for the url, enter a mobile URL (i.e. m.milb.com) not the web url*

And we hit Submit
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then we will receive the notification successfully and tapping on the notification will open up the First Pitch app and take the user to that article

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user enables notifications for a team on a device and then navigates to
push notification test util.html
Gameday test
and then changes vendor id  to a new unique id that has not been used before
and we paste the following payload into the 'apnsPayload' section:
{"e":["game.start"],"aps":{"sound":"default","alert":{"body":"MiLB <teamname> alert","action-loc-key":"View"}},"c":["team_idxxx"], "gid" : "xxxx/xx/xx_xxxxxx_xxxxxx_1"}

And we hit Submit
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then we will successfully receive a notification of type 'game.start' and the notification will successfully open First Pitch and take us to Gameday

Gameday Test
and then changes vendor id  to a new unique id that has not been used before
and we paste the following payload into the 'apnsPayload' section:
{"e":["game.end"],"aps":{"sound":"default","alert":{"body":"MiLB <teamname> alert","action-loc-key":"View"}},"c":["team_idxxx"], "gid" : "xxxx/xx/xx_xxxxxx_xxxxxx_1"}

And we hit Submit
